titles.title: A bill to require review and approval for future research on nonhuman primates, and for other purposes.
Primate Protection and Research Modernization Act of 2018
Primate Protection and Research Modernization Act of 2018
Primate Protection and Research Modernization Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Primate Protection and Research Modernization Act of 2018
This bill establishes limitations regarding research on nonhuman primates.
